ImageFunction.drawText

Function/Meaning
Text Rendering
Type
Method of ImageFunction class
Syntax
drawText(bmp, font, x, y, text, color, opa=255, aa=true, face=dfAlpha, shadowlevel=0, shadowcolor=0x000000, shadowwidth=0, shadowofsx=0, shadowofsy=0, hda=false, cliprect=null)
Arguments
bmp Specifies the Bitmap object to draw text on.
font Specifies the font to draw with as a Font object.
x Specifies the x-coordinate (in image coordinates) of the origin where text drawing starts, in pixels.
y Specifies the y-coordinate (in image coordinates) of the origin where text drawing starts, in pixels.
text Specifies the text to draw.
color Specifies the color of the text to draw in 0xRRGGBB format.
opa Specifies the opacity of the text to draw (-255 to 0 to 255).
Specifying a negative number is only valid when face is dfAlpha; in this case, opacity is removed in the shape of the text (the smaller the value, the greater the effect).
aa Specifies whether to perform anti-aliasing.
If true, anti-aliasing is performed. If false, it is not.
face Specifies the drawing method.
If dfAlpha is specified, the image is treated as an image with an alpha channel and drawn.
If dfAddAlpha is specified, the image is treated as an image with an additive alpha channel and drawn.
If dfOpaque is specified, the image is treated as completely opaque and drawn.
shadowlevel Specifies the opacity of the shadow. The appropriate value varies depending on the shadowwidth argument.
If 0 is specified, no shadow is drawn.
shadowcolor Specifies the shadow color in 0xRRGGBB format.
shadowwidth Specifies the shadow width (blur). 0 is the sharpest (no blur), and increasing the value blurs the shadow.
shadowofsx Specifies the x-coordinate offset of the shadow in pixels. If 0 is specified, the shadow is drawn directly below.
shadowofsy Specifies the y-coordinate offset of the shadow in pixels. If 0 is specified, the shadow is drawn directly below.
hda Specifies whether to protect the alpha channel.
cliprect Specifies the clipping region as a Rect object (in image coordinates).
If unspecified, the entire area is targeted.
Return Value
Drawing area (Rect object)
Description
Draws text on the Bitmap.
When dfOpaque is specified for face, whether the destination mask is destroyed or protected depends on hda.
